rules_text:
Vigilance
[i]Hellfire Missiles [/i]– {X}{R}, {T}, Salvage X: Steel Watcher Titan deals X damage distributed as you choose among any number of targets. That damage can’t be prevented. [i](To salvage X, sacrifice X artifacts.)[/i]
[i]Launch Protocol: Bola [/i]– Whenever Steel Watcher Titan attacks, you may tap it. If you do, tap target creature.
